title: Pfriem Family Brewers
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A brewpub restaurant which welcomes children also. Menu has salads, roasted vegetables, a vegetarian burger, and one vegan entr√©e. Alternates between offering a non-vegan soup or vegan soup, so ask -- the lentil soup is vegan. Located on the Columbia River waterfront and has a outside area with fire pit.
